Name: Fight Club - All Stars
About the game: The creator of the mobile hit 'I, The One' presents 'Fight Club - All Stars'! Kick enemies & knock them out of the arena in this funny fighting simulator! You’re on the top of the roof or on the island or on the boat. What will you do? Kick, punch, knockout — fight for the survival of course! There's only room for one fighter in this ring. So take it! Features: ● Single player mode ● Local multiplayer co-operative ● Local multiplayer up to 4 local players ● Kick them all - make them fall! ● Kick them hard - make them fart! ● Punch the head - no regret! ● Shout loud - amuse crowd! Choose characters to play: ● Kids ● Hyper-Casual ● Cuboids ● 'I, The One' ● Mini Fighters ● Real Fighters ● Dogs ● Musculans ● Papers Choose your favorite fight style: ● Street Fighter ● Capoeira ● Karate ● Boxing ● Jeet Kune Do ● Pub Fighter ● Muay Thai ● Kung-Fu Additional Notes: ● Controller is highly recommended. ● Controllers are required for 2-4 players.
